body:
no, this is right, there are two differences between THTensor_nDimensionLegacyAll and dim:
`THTensor_nDimensionLegacyAll` collapses empty tensors to 0 (that is checked with empty here).
`THTensor_nDimensionLegacyAll` unexpands scalrs to 1 dim.  This compares to 2, so that doesn't matter.
